variable.name: SUBJID

variable.value: Control with Change in Cognitive Status

variable.description: Investigator's ID

variable.name: CAFUSE
variable.description: How many cups (or cans) of drinks with caffeine do you have per day?

variable.name: EDDUR
variable.description: How many years did you go to school?

variable.name: MEMCH
variable.description: During the last year has the (memory) problem been getting worse?

variable.name: MEMWK
variable.description: Are you concerned about your memory because it affects how you live or work?
